text: Mercedes-Benz Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in Atlanta, Georgia, United States and is the home to the Atlanta Falcons of the National Football League and Atlanta United FC of Major League Soccer. Category:21st-century establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:2017 establishments in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Sports in Atlanta Category:Football stadiums in the United States Category:Soccer stadiums in the United States
title: Mercedes-Benz Stadium
